meanings.definition: A short novel or long short story.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed reading a novella during my lunch break.
meanings.sent2: The novella I read last night was very engaging.
meanings.sent3: The novella had a surprise ending that made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a novella, full of unexpected twists.
meanings.sent5: The vivid descriptions in the novella painted a clear picture in my mind.

meanings.definition: A work of fiction that is longer than a short story but shorter than a novel.
meanings.sent1: The novella I borrowed from the library was a quick read.
meanings.sent2: She wrote a novella that captivated the readers with its plot.
meanings.sent3: The novella's characters were so quirky and fun to follow.
meanings.sent4: His writing style in the novella was like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The novella left a lasting impression on me with its emotional depth.
